item.title: Flow vs. Impedance vs. Sabotage
item.description: Flow is impacted by many different factors, but the topics I'd like to touch on are communication, process, and culture. Communication In 1968, Conway observed: "Organizations which design systems are constrained to produce designs which are copies of the communication structures of these organizations." This is known as Conwayâ€™s law. Worded a bit differently: Organizations which design processes are constrained to produce a process flow which is a copy of the communication structures between departments.
